name: CoresyfImageCrop
description: Tool that uses GDAL raster utility program 'gdalwarp' to crop an image for a specific region of interest, defined by the geometry containing a buffer region around the bounds of a Grid Shapefile.

inputs.name: grid
inputs.description: The path for the Grid Shapefile

parameters.name: buffer
parameters.description: Buffer (in buffer units) to be applied around the crop region

parameters.name: Buffer units
parameters.description: Value must be one of 'pixels', 'degrees' or 'meters'
